scripts.mainnet: sed -i 's/const network = lwk.Network.testnet()/const network = lwk.Network.mainnet()/g' index.js
scripts.testnet: sed -i 's/const network = lwk.Network.mainnet()/const network = lwk.Network.testnet()/g' index.js
scripts.deploy-mainnet: npm run mainnet && npm run build && npm run sync-mainnet
scripts.deploy-testnet: npm run testnet && npm run build && npm run sync-testnet
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-mainnet && npm run deploy-testnet
scripts.sync-mainnet: rsync -avh dist/ root@praga:/var/www/liquidwebwallet.org/ && rsync -avh dist/ root@gandi:/var/www/liquidwebwallet.org/
